analyzed: srog gi dbang po 'gag pa'i tshhe/_/bshes gnyen srog dang bral nas gshin rjes
translated: When the life force of the spiritual friend is gone and Yama leads you away,🔽When you cry out in a feeble voice,

original: khrid/_/nyams thag nga ros 'o dod 'bod pa la/_/'jigs pa skyob phyir srid
analyzed: khrid/_/nyams thag nga ros 'o dod 'bod pa la/_/'jigs pa skyob phyir srid
translated: The sole friend of the three worlds protects you from fear.🔽In the time of five hundred years, the five poisons of beings

analyzed: gsum gnyen cig ma/_/rtshod dus lnga brgya'i skye bo dug lnga rag_/sangs rgyas
translated: Are purified by the five paths of the five buddha families.

original: bka' smod mkhas pa'i sku la bsdo/_/log ltas byang chub bar chad byed pa'i/_/
analyzed: bka' smod mkhas pa'i sku la bsdo/_/log ltas byang chub bar chad byed pa'i/_/
translated: The dakinis who quickly kill the enemy🔽Who obscures the body of the learned with slander,🔽Who creates obstacles to enlightenment with wrong views,

original: dgra bo myur du gsod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/shes rab mig bu ma rig ling thog
analyzed: dgra bo myur du gsod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/_/shes rab mig bu ma rig ling thog
translated: And who, blinded by the cataracts of ignorance,🔽Falls into the abyss of the unfavorable states,

original: gis/_/mdongs nas mi khom g.yang sar ltung ba la/_/bsdu ba'i lcags kyus
analyzed: gis/_/mdongs nas mi khom g.yang sar ltung ba la/_/bsdu ba'i lcags kyus
translated: With the hook of attraction🔽And shows the path to enter the unerring,

original: bzung nas yang dag lam/_/ma nor drang por 'jug pa'i lam ston ma/_/
analyzed: bzung nas yang dag lam/_/ma nor drang por 'jug pa'i lam ston ma/_/
translated: Straight path of perfect🔽.

original: bde ba'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan rje btshun ma la bstod pa bzhugs so//
analyzed: bde ba'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan rje btshun ma la bstod pa bzhugs so//
translated: Praise to the Glorious and Gracious Lady, the Source of Happiness🔽By the power of generating bodhichitta and the power of increasing aspirations,

analyzed: sems bskyed stobs dang smon lam 'phel stobs kyis/_/dus gsum mi bshol
translated: Without delay in the three times,🔽With compassion that does not procrastinate,

analyzed: thugs rje phyi shol med/_/sems can don la 'khor ba ma stong bar/_/dam
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, until samsara is emptied,🔽With a loving mind that is not weary or discouraged by the vow,

analyzed: bcas skyo dub med pa'i byams sems ma/_/rtogs pa'i chos nyid mkha' la 'gro
translated: Though having gone to the sky of the realized dharmata,🔽In order to tame the wicked, you emanate in wrathful forms,

analyzed: gyur kyang /_/gdug pa 'dul phyir khro mo'i skur sprul nas/_/sangs rgyas bstan

analyzed: pa'i bar chad byed pa yi/_/dgra bo myur du gsod pa'i sgrol byed ma/_/de ltar

analyzed: mtshhan gyi me tog bcu rtsha gnyis/_/dpe byad brgyad cu 'bras bu'i bstod pa ni/_/
translated: The praise of the result, the thirty-two marks and the eighty minor marks,🔽is like a precious ornament that beautifies the one who accomplishes all goals.

original: don kun grub byed rin chen rgyan 'drar mdzes/_/rgyal ba kun gyi bstod pa'i
analyzed: don kun grub byed rin chen rgyan 'drar mdzes/_/rgyal ba kun gyi bstod pa'i

original: rgyal po mchog_/mtshhan thos pas ni skal ba stong gi bar/_/ngan song mi skye
analyzed: rgyal po mchog_/mtshhan thos pas ni skal ba stong gi bar/_/ngan song mi skye
translated: by hearing the marks, for a thousand eons one will not be born in the lower realms.

original: las ngan sdig sgrib mdzad/_/glo bur 'jigs pa kun las thar byed cing /_/
analyzed: las ngan sdig sgrib mdzad/_/glo bur 'jigs pa kun las thar byed cing /_/
translated: It purifies bad karma, misdeeds, and obscurations, and liberates from all sudden dangers.🔽  It makes the wise ones endowed with lineage and good fortune.

original: blo ldan rigs dang skal bar ldan par byed/_/gang zhig gtshang sbra nang par sngar
analyzed: blo ldan rigs dang skal bar ldan par byed/_/gang zhig gtshang sbra nang par sngar
translated: Whoever, in the early morning,🔽arises with enthusiasm, devotion, and undistracted concentration,

original: lang ste_/_/spro zhing gus par ma yengs ting 'dzin gyis/_/gsum 'am bdun
analyzed: lang ste_/_/spro zhing gus par ma yengs ting 'dzin gyis/_/gsum 'am bdun

analyzed: nam nyi shu rtsha gcig sogs/_/klog gam kha ton brjod pa rab bsgrags na/_/

analyzed: tshhe rabs sngon gyi las ngan bag chags sad/_/nyon mongs mi dge sdig sgrib
translated: the previous bad karma and latent tendencies will awaken, and afflictions, non-virtue, misdeeds, and obscurations🔽will be purified.

original: 'byang bar byed/_/mtshhams med lnga dang nye ba lnga la sogs/_/sdig pa stobs🔽chen ma lus dag par byed/_/ngan 'gro sdug bsngal 'ching ba gcod byed cing /_/

translated: sins.🔽It cuts the bonds of the sufferings of the lower realms🔽and liberates from all the sufferings of cyclic existence.

original: srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/mchog dang thun mong yon
analyzed: srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/mchog dang thun mong yon

original: tan rdzogs par byed/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sras su dbang bskur zhing /_/byams
analyzed: tan rdzogs par byed/_/rgyal ba kun gyi sras su dbang bskur zhing /_/byams

original: sems mkha' 'gro lha srin sde brgyad kyis/_/grogs dang rje bor bkur ba'i
analyzed: sems mkha' 'gro lha srin sde brgyad kyis/_/grogs dang rje bor bkur ba'i

analyzed: gnas su mthong /_/bag la nyal dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams/_/dag cing
translated: It purifies the obscurations of the latent tendencies and of knowledge🔽and quickly brings the attainment of buddhahood.

original: sangs rgyas go 'phang myur du 'thob/_/tshhe 'dir 'jigs pa gnod sbyin srin po
analyzed: sangs rgyas go 'phang myur du 'thob/_/tshhe 'dir 'jigs pa gnod sbyin srin po

analyzed: dang /_/'byung po ro langs sha za mang po'i tshhogs/_/grib gnon la sogs
translated: bhutas, vetalas, and many other flesh-eating demons,🔽the fear of being oppressed by evil influences, and so forth,

original: rtshub cing sdang sems kyis/_/gnod pa'i 'jigs pa dran pas sel bar byed/_/
analyzed: rtshub cing sdang sems kyis/_/gnod pa'i 'jigs pa dran pas sel bar byed/_/
translated: are removed by the recollection of the wrathful ones.

original: pha rol dmag tshhogs gcan zan mi rgod dang /_/rkun po dug sbrul rgyal po'i chad
analyzed: pha rol dmag tshhogs gcan zan mi rgod dang /_/rkun po dug sbrul rgyal po'i chad

original: pa dang /_/seng ge glang po stag dang me dang chu/_/'jigs pa brgyad sogs
analyzed: pa dang /_/seng ge glang po stag dang me dang chu/_/'jigs pa brgyad sogs
translated: the eight fears, and so forth,🔽and untimely death—

original: la sogs pa'i/_/gnod pa'i sdug bsngal zhi zhing sel bar byed/_/byin
analyzed: la sogs pa'i/_/gnod pa'i sdug bsngal zhi zhing sel bar byed/_/byin

analyzed: rlabs myur zhing rab myur thugs rje can/_/gsol ba gang btab dngos grub
translated: It is endowed with swift and very swift blessings,🔽and all the accomplishments

analyzed: thams cad dang /_/brtshe ba chen pos skad cig nyid la ste/_/mi bsnyel skyob

original: mdzad yum la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rgyal ba rin po che'i dgongs pa ltar/_/phun
analyzed: mdzad yum la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/rgyal ba rin po che'i dgongs pa ltar/_/phun

analyzed: sum tshhogs pa'i dge 'dun rgya mtshho rnams/_/'dun pa 'thun zhing byams pa'i

analyzed: sems ldan nas/_/bde ldan zhing ltar byin gyis rlab tu gsol/_/sa steng

original: 'dzam bu gling 'di thams cad kyang /_/pha rol gdug pa'i tshhogs ni zhi gyur cing /_/🔽bka' rgyud rin chen dar zhing rgyas pa dang /_/'phrin las rgyun chad med par

translated: May all the lands of this world be pacified of the forces of evil,🔽and may the precious teachings of the Kagyu lineage spread and flourish.🔽We pray that your enlightened activity will be uninterrupted,

original: mdzad du gsol/_/thub pa'i bstan pa nyi bzhin gsal gyur cing /_/sgrub pa
analyzed: mdzad du gsol/_/thub pa'i bstan pa nyi bzhin gsal gyur cing /_/sgrub pa

translated: they will be blessed and brought to the same state as you.🔽We pray that wherever we dwell,

analyzed: gnas pa'i sa phyogs su/_/mngon dga'i zhing dang dga' tshhal lta bur ni/_/

original: sems can sdug bsngal thams cad zhi gyur cing /_/'gro rnams bde chen sa la
analyzed: sems can sdug bsngal thams cad zhi gyur cing /_/'gro rnams bde chen sa la
translated: and are brought to the state of great bliss.🔽From now until we reach the essence of enlightenment,

original: 'god par shog_/ding nas bzung nas byang chub snying po'i bar/_/bcom
analyzed: 'god par shog_/ding nas bzung nas byang chub snying po'i bar/_/bcom
translated: we pray that you will be our protector,

analyzed: ldan 'das ma khyod dang mi 'bral zhing /_/thugs rje'i lcags kyus rtag tu bzung

analyzed: nas kyang /_/dus rnams thams cad byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_/yon tan

original: bde ba'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan rje btshun ma la bstod pa bzhugs so//
analyzed: bde ba'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan rje btshun ma la bstod pa bzhugs so//

analyzed: mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das ma la/_/cung zad bstod pa'i bsod nams ci

analyzed: myur thob shog/_//'di mtshhan yongs su grags pa rin po ches gsungs pa
